item.title: Starting a Blog with Hugo, Cupper, and GitHub Pages
item.description: Introduction This blog post explains how this blog was created. It is an integration of: The Hugo Quick Start The Cupper Theme README Hugo’s Hosting on GitHub instructions. I wrote this blog post because I could not find any step-by-step instructions that actually work. For example, almost all start with “hugo new site …” but then don’t explain how to get that new directory into git or GitHub. It’s an exercise left to the reader.
